Class OpenCDXNotificationServiceImpl

OpenCDXNotificationService
@Service public class OpenCDXNotificationServiceImpl extends Object implements OpenCDXNotificationService
Service for processing Communications Requests.

      Constructor taking some repositoroes
      Parameters:
      openCDXAuditService - Audit service for tracking FDA requirements
      openCDXNotificationEventRepository - Repository for saving Notification Events
      openCDXNotificaitonRepository - Repository for saving Notificaitons
      openCDXEmailService - Email service for sending emails
      openCDXSMSService - SMS Service for sending SMS
      openCDXHTMLProcessor - HTML Process for processing HTML Templates.
      openCDXMessageService - Message Service for sending messages
      openCDXCurrentUser - Current User Service to access information.
      openCDXCommunicationSmsService - SMS Service to use for handling SMS
      openCDXCommunicationEmailService - Email Service to use for handling Email
      objectMapper - ObjectMapper used for converting messages for the audit system.
      openCDXDocumentValidator - Document Validator for validating documents.
      openCDXProfileRepository - Repository for accessing Profiles.
      openCDXMessageRepository - Repository for accessing Messages.
